summary: Diff adds a Motoko backend actor plus a new React/TanStack Router + React Query frontend implementing Internet Identity login, profile setup, video upload/playback UI, and a points-gated watch button. Key gaps/risks are around backend watch-history data fields and the introduction of admin/access-control features not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Watch history entries must include watcher principal, video id, and timestamp (append-only watch history record).
missing_requirements.reason: The backend WatchRecord type shown only contains videoId and timestamp; it does not include the watcher principal. Storing history in a Map keyed by user does not satisfy the explicit field requirement as written.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin/access-control initialization via a secret token and authorization mixins.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists admin moderation tools as a non-goal; the diff adds access control state, admin checks, and initialization with a URL-provided "caffeineAdminToken".

hallucinated_features.description: Caffeine.ai promotional footer link in the app shell.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in any requirement; adds external promotional link/copy in the global layout/footer.
